column1: My family is freaking out about the coronavirus.I'm not kidding.
What does that have to do with outdoor flamenco? And I seriously doubt it. Madrile√±os are still bundled up against the cold.
As precautions go that is a very strange one, you will already have mingled with the masses at the airport. What about visiting any of the museums/sights etcEdited: 2:23 pm, February 27, 2020
None of the flamenco venues are outdoors.The best flamenco:https://www.corraldelamoreria.com/Their restaurant has one Michelin star, so you may want to have dinner there before the show.
